channel.title: Henry Vu's Technical Blog
channel.description: Deep-dive technical content about AI engineering, ML systems, and decision-making algorithms.

item.title: What Fills the Context Window
item.description: A practitioner's guide to context engineering for LLMs. What actually fills the context window, how to manage token budgets, the four strategies (write, select, compress, isolate), failure modes, and measuring context quality.

item.title: Multi-Armed Bandits: Foundations
item.description: Deep dive into the exploration-exploitation tradeoff. Covers regret, finite-armed stochastic bandits, concentration inequalities, Explore-then-Commit, and Upper Confidence Bound (UCB) with interactive visualizations.
